title: I Love Sweet Things
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Kotori-chan, this manga is really interesting~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, it is, right? I’ll leave the rest of the volumes here, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Thanks~. Looks like I’ll read it all in one sitting…. But I’m getting a little hungry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I can quickly make pancakes, do you want one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Pancakes!? I’d love it! I’m so happy~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Then, I’ll make it a special one with 3 layers just for Honoka-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh~!! Can I really have that many!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Plus, I’ll add plenty of fruits and whipped cream on top!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uwaaah~~~! Amazing, amazing! Thank you~! I love you, Kotori-chan-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, I love you too, Honoka-chan! But if you keep hugging me like that I can’t make the pancakes~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
